{{infobox character | people=[[Hobbits|Hobbit]] | name=Adalgrim Took | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Great Smials]] | affiliation= | language= | birth={{SR|1280}} | birthlocation= | rule= | death={{SR|1382}} | deathlocation= | age=102 | notablefor= | family=[[Took Family|Took]] | parentage=[[Hildigrim Took]] and [[Rosa Baggins]] | siblings= | spouse= | children=[[Paladin Took II|Paladin]] and [[Esmeralda Took|Esmeralda]] | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }}'''Adalgrim Took''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]]. ==History== Adalgrim was the only child of [[Hildigrim Took]] and [[Rosa Baggins]]. He had five children, four of them daughters. His youngest children were [[Paladin Took II|Paladin]] and [[Esmeralda Took|Esmeralda]], born in {{SR|1333}} and {{SR|1336}}.{{App|Took}} ==Etymology== Adalgrim comes from the Germanic elements ''adal'' meaning "noble" and ''grim'' meaning "fierce".{{HM|IE}}, Giving of Names, p. 191 ==Genealogy== {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | | | OLD |y| CHU | | | | PON |y| MIM | OLD=[[Gerontius Took|The Old Took]]
